dict.string:
Lets you group layers together. Connect it to a Layer patch to display it and adjust how it shows up.
This patch is a renamed version of the Render in Image patch that comes with Quartz Composer to be consistent with the Origami naming scheme. It also does not require a Clear patch, unlike Render in Image.
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
Use of this patch is subject to the license found at http://origami.facebook.com/license/
